name: Crazy Designer
description:
A strategy and simulation game about interior design.


There are hundreds different kinds of family which has different request.

Different conditions have to be considered, and you need to make the perfect arrangement to create the happy life for every family.

Real-time updated furniture stream. Do I need to buy it now for future use?

Once a case is accomplished, the player can get the reward cash and goodwill score, and another more challenging case will be waiting for the player.

SPECIALTY


9 topics and more than 1200 items in the game.

Excellent A.I., clients will tell the player their admiration and complaint right away.
